Text:
Thank you so much! I found this on demonoid, and I can't wait to try this out.

(too bad i already paid the US $10 for the RB2 export =/ )
The least you could have done was mention it's for wii.
i put it in the wii section, and used wii terminology in the description, which i thought would be enough, but i'll see if it lets me rename it as well..
